InitBlock.name: CD_SR_SEV_CRITICAL

DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: select case when C.TRANS_TABLE_ID is null then V.VAL else V.NAME end from VALUEOF(TBO).S_LST_OF_VAL V, VALUEOF(TBO).S_COLUMN C, VALUEOF(TBO).S_TABLE T where T.NAME = 'S_SRV_REQ' and C.NAME = 'SR_SEV_CD' and C.TBL_ID = T.ROW_ID and V.TYPE = 'SR_SEVERITY' and V.NAME = '1-Critical' and V.LANG_ID = 'VALUEOF(OLTP_LANG_ID)'

InitBlock.InitString: select case when C.TRANS_TABLE_ID is null then V.VAL else V.NAME end from VALUEOF(TBO).S_LST_OF_VAL V, VALUEOF(TBO).S_COLUMN C, VALUEOF(TBO).S_TABLE T where T.NAME = 'S_SRV_REQ' and C.NAME = 'SR_SEV_CD' and C.TBL_ID = T.ROW_ID and V.TYPE = 'SR_SEVERITY' and V.NAME = '1-Critical' and V.LANG_ID = 'VALUEOF(OLTP_LANG_ID)'
